item.title: -Requests help for common problem?
item.dc:creator: @dragon39990 dragon39990
item.description:
@dragon39990 wrote:

Try using this one you don’t need to set up JDK for it, but you HAVE to have JDK.

[code=java]@echo off
:menu
title Final Conquest compiler
echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo Welcome to Final Conquest compiler, By Dragon39990.
echo --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo Note: Remember the rule if you get 100 errors
echo You need a } for every {
echo Errors will show up if any below the line.
echo ________________________________________________________________________________
echo Errors:
echo ________________________________________________________________________________
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto

error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe”

http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Compiling Finished.
pause
exit [/code]

Read full topic
